title: Never Fallin by Basix
description:
Never Fallin is a modern anthem.  Young men and women, all over the world, are fighting the good fight, trying to keep their heads above water, all the while today's society is presenting road-block after road-block to thwart their efforts.  Never Fallin' is my defiant cry; promising that I will not allow myself to succumb to these modern obstacles.  Homage to Living Legends.


LYRICS

Basix Intro:
Man, I'm never going down
Fucking busters, haha
Basix!
What up? Risk It All Records in the building

Basix Verse:
I'm never falling, always pouring out intense emotion
Exploring all that I've endured, causes sense explosion
And I ain't said much, to give y'all a dizzy head rush
Constantly flowing, but y'all know not where I'm going, hush
Acceptance is a blessing, got to follow the road
It ain't a guessing game, grind in unstoppable mode
When an issue unaddressed it can slow the gears
Here's my confession, I've lived by the code for years
Let the music take control and hold onto what's real
Feel the vibe, never sell away your soul for a deal
So I ain't never falling down, never call him soft
I intercept ambushes, better call it off
This is Basix up in boss mode, don't cross my path
Hate on me all you want, but please get off my ass
Because I ain't never falling off, I just follow through
And that's today, yesterday, and tomorrow too,

(Yeah, Sneeks)
(Right!)

Sneeks Verse:
I was brought up to keep the fight, Never sleep cuz
If you ever sleepin you end up wishing, So I keep on hustling
Keep a small group of loved ones and I'll trust in that
Cuz they kept my mind right and Hip Hop saved my life
And I don't gotta front cuz I'm known that we doing alright
And I'm never falling, and I'm saying true levels so you know about it
With ambition there will never be no limit, keep on going higher
Straight through the ceiling, so don't matter what they tell you
Just keep your head up through all the rough, and you'll never be falling

Solo Da Masta Verse:
A boy became a sinner because the winner was his brother
Now they asking have you seen him, where's he been and where's his lover
But he's got this thing that's in him, sweet like cinnamon, but bitter
Might be spicy but the mix it so unique it's almost bitter, uh
His mind is uncontrollable, it's almost up to space
He's not high, he's just lost, you can see it in his taste
He likes what's weird, but he cannot reach
You can preach, but you won't teach nothing to little leach
I say what's in my soul, sound style the concrete
I can give you everything, man no sneak peak
That's what he says, putting on his headphones going straight to bed

Spacely Verse:
I got a lot shit that stays on my mind, 
I'm trying to be in first place, but I'm steadily behind.
Honestly, I thought I would be signed,
guess that's just a dream when you're constantly blind.
Really, I truly don't know what to do
a lot of bullshit in the game has me askew.
In reality, things really aren't the same,
the games fucked up but we looking for change.
Probably the reason why I get high to escape
from my problems by putting them on stand by
Now I'm, not saying I'm best,
I'm just an individual who stays constantly stressed.
And I'm blessed to be thinking about the drama,
I'm trying to achieve peace, like the Dahli Lama...
Like the Dahli Lama
